head.title: Thrall Independent School District

img.alt: Meal Distribution is Back at ES-MS Cafetorium Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Meal Distribution is Back at ES-MS Cafetorium

article.div: Thrall ISD will continue to provide nutritious meals for any child age 18 and under. Beginning on Tuesday, April 27, meal distribution will return to the front of the ES-MS Cafetorium. Read more...

img.alt: Schools Closed for Remainder of This Year Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Schools Closed for Remainder of This Year

article.div: Governor Greg Abbott issued a new Executive Order on Friday, April 17, in which all schools will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 academic year. Remote learning will continue for the benefit of our students. Read Superintendent Hooker's message...

img.alt: Elementary Materials Return/Pick Up on Monday Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Elementary Materials Return/Pick Up on Monday

article.div: We know our ES students have continued their hard work during the past few weeks! Thank you parents for all you are doing! Keep up the great efforts! Our next return/pick up packet date is Monday, April 20 from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. Read more...

img.alt: MS Materials Return/Pick Up Scheduled for Mondays/Tuesdays Thumbnail Image

h1.a: MS Materials Return/Pick Up Scheduled for Mondays/Tuesdays

article.div: As our MS students have been working hard during the past few weeks, it is time to show us your progress! Mondays and Tuesdays have been designated as return/pick up paper copy packet times at the MS car rider circle. Read more...

img.alt: PreK & Kindergarten 2020-21 Online Registration Open Thumbnail Image

article.div: Online registration for NEW PreKindergarten and Kindergarten students for next school year, 2020-21, is now open, April 8-17, for parents to register their new students. Read more...
Thrall ISD is pleased to provide Internet access in two of its parking lots, especially for those students who do not have Internet access at their homes. Read more...
